articles.author: Esther Ogenyi
articles.title: Suffering is evil - Omotola laments after leaving Nigeria - Daily Post Nigeria
articles.description: Famous Nollywood actress, Omotola Jalade-Ekeinde has disclosed how “deeply frustrated” she feels seeing Nigerians suffer in the country. Omo Sexy, as she is fondly called by her fans, left Nigeria with her family two years ago for the United State of America,…
articles.content:

articles.title: Researchers Seek Standardized and Safe Antidepressant Tapering Protocol - Mad in America
articles.description: A new study promotes the use of a standardized approach to antidepressant tapering.
articles.content: New research investigating current antidepressant tapering trends finds that strategies for reducing doses over time can lead to varying results in different individuals. The review, published in the… [+5713 chars]

articles.title: What's behind the Big Tobacco job cuts? A guide to SA's illegal tobacco trade after Covid-19 - News24
